dct_title_s: CARTA HYDROGRAPHICA oder ALGEMEINE WELT und COMMERCIEN CARTE Warinnen die Grosse Meer, und Seen, auch See Kusten, und fornehmbste Laender, der GANTZEN WELT, neben denen Schiffarthen nach West und Oost Indien auch von dar Zurucke, deutlich entworffen
dct_description_sm: [1704?], with AUGSPURG, Gabriel Bodenehr Excudit. (lower left). Issued in: Atlas curieux, oder neuer und compendieuser atlas … / G. Bodenehr. – Augspurg, [1704?].
Johann Stridbeck Junior fecit et Excudit.

California shown with a northern point. The island becomes quite thin in the middle. No place or island name. Commerical routes to and from the West and East Indies are shown. The title sits above the map in its own box with decorative flourishes on either side. To the left of the map is a list of the oceans of the world. To the right of the map is a list of the largest seas. Ships are shown at the top two corners. Stridbeck. (lower left). Cum Gratia et Privilegio Sac: Caes. Maj. (lower right).
